price: The revelation of the Book, about which there is no doubt, is from the Lord of the worlds.
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
